item.title: Compile error :(
item.dc:creator: @SmokeSome SmokeSome
item.description:
@SmokeSome wrote:

client.java:12821: playerTitle is already defined in customCommand(java.lang.String) String[] playerTitle = {"","[MOD]","[ADMIN]","[OWNER]"}; ^ Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 1 error
what do i do? this is what i edited.

[code]
String playerTitle = “”;
{
if

(playerRights == 3)

	playerTitle = "[OWNER]";
						if

(playerRights == 2)

	playerTitle = "[ADMINISTRATOR]";
						if

(playerRights == 1)

	playerTitle = "[MODERATOR]";
						if

(playerName.equals(“PLAYERNAME HERE”))

	playerTitle = "[PLAYER TITLE HERE]";
							
PlayerHandler.messageToAll =

playerTitle+""+playerName+": "+command.substring(5);
}

if(command.startsWith("yell")) {

String[] playerTitle = {"","[MOD]","[ADMIN]","[OWNER]"};

PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerTitle[playerRights]+ "

"+command.substring(5); }
}[/code]
